No. 43, No. 44, No. 46, No. 47,

Orig.

Oregon v. Mitchell, Attorney General; Texas v. Mitchell, Attorney General; United States v. Arizona; and United States v. Idaho.

[Motions to file bills of complaint granted, ante, p. 802.] Motion of the Solicitor General to consolidate these cases for oral argument granted. . Motion of Frederick J. Christopher, Jr., et al. for leave to intervene and participate in oral argument-in No. 46, Orig., denied.
